des:
Control all the functions in your home with simple voice commands. You can ask the skill to switch on/off or adjust the colour and the light intensity of lamps, move roller shutters, run scenarios, adjust the temperture and so on.

With this skill you can control all the domotic objects (KNX and Zigbee) connected to the Gewiss Smart Gateway: thermostats, dimmable lights, RGB lights, smart plugs, scenes and much more.

In order to use this skill, you must have a Smart Gateway in your home system; once you link your Smart Gateway account with that of Amazon Alexa, all the domotic elements controlled by Smart Gateway will be displayed in the list of Alexa devices and can also be controlled through the voice assistant.
